testcase.name: an authentication token is invalidated after logout()
log in user twice should throw exception()
user never been in the system isUserLoggedIn returns null()
an authentication token is invalidated after logout, stays that way after reboot()
registered user log in with another logged in user s password should throw exception()
log out a none exist user ()
registered user log in with another registered not logged in user s password should throw exception()
registered user log in with wrong password should throw exception()
user log in then log out isUserLoggedIn returns False()
log in user twice and other users log in between should throw exception()
user stays logged in after reboot, assumes his token stays active()
after login, a user is logged in()
